reviews.review_msg: Easily one of the best profs at SFU. Insanely clear during lecture, and she posts audio/video of what she does in class so students could clarify material (or catch up because they skipped lol). Textbook wasn't necessary as she really just tests on what she lectures. Midterm marks were sky high because this is a prof that can actually teach.

I think she should teach all the bio courses there are at SFU. She is really helpful and the exams are fair and if you study her notes you will definitely do well on your exams.She's also really funny...all in a nutshell she is a prof. that keeps you interested you in this course.  I suggest if you have to take Genetics take it with her:)!!
